metadata.title: CVE-2012-2252 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Incomplete blacklist vulnerability in rssh before 2.3.4, when the rsyncprotocol is enabled, allows local users to bypass intended restricted shellaccess via the --rsh command line option.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2252` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

rssh - 2.3.4-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rssh package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.4-4').
